QuestData.Title: What's Eating Zhu's Watch?
QuestData.Description: Pandaren always welcome travelers with open arms - and open kegs! But this town full of jerks!$B$BEveryone so busy sulking, they won't talk to Ken-Ken at all!$B$BCan you find someone in town who will talk to us? Maybe normal pandaren just hiding in the houses?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the inhabitants in Zhu's Watch and find someone willing to talk to you.
QuestData.CompletionText: Something definitely not right! Pandaren supposed to be HAPPY!
QuestData.RewardText: Only one lady-panda who's not crazy? This worse than Ken-Ken thought...

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Despondent Warden of Zhu
